DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the efficacy of iron (12.5 mg as ferrous sulfate) and placebo given for 6 months in preventing the elevation of blood lead concentration in children 6-9 months of age.
DOC.criteria: Infants included if gestational age >36 weeks, birth weight > 2500g, no chronic illness, blood lead concentration <10 mcg/dL, hemoglobin >9 g/dL, zinc protoporphyrin >90 mmol/mol heme Mothers included if 18 years or older
